text: Geordi La Forge is a character in the series Star Trek: The Next Generation. He is played by LeVar Burton. == Character Story == Geordi was born blind and must wear a VISOR to help him see. Geordi was born on February 16, 2335. His parents were Silva La Forge and Edward M. La Forge. He also had a sister. He went to the Zefram Cochrane High School. He later went to Starfleet Academy from 2353 to 2357. He was assigned as an ensign in the USS Victory. Category:Star Trek: The Next Generation characters
title: Geordi La Forge
